mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (board_id, board_title, board_content, board_date, user_id, board_category_id, read_count) VALUES(#{boardId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, sysdate, #{userId}, #{boardCategoryId}, default)
INSERT INTO board_file (b_file_id, board_id, b_file_name, b_file_size, b_file_content_type, b_file_data) VALUES (#{bFileId}, #{boardId}, #{bFileName}, #{bFileSize}, #{bFileContentType}, #{bFileData})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE=#{boardTitle}, BOARD_CONTENT=#{boardContent}, BOARD_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_ID=#{boardId}
UPDATE BOARD_FILE SET B_FILE_NAME=#{bFileName}, B_FILE_SIZE=#{bFileSize}, B_FILE_CONTENT_TYPE=#{bFileContentType}, B_FILE_DATA=#{bFileData} WHERE B_FILE_ID=#{bFileId}
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_ID AS "boardId", BOARD_CATEGORY_ID AS "boardCategoryId", USER_ID AS "userId", BOARD_TITLE AS "boardTitle", BOARD_DATE AS "boardDate", READ_COUNT AS "readCount", RNUM+1 AS "seq" FROM ( SELECT BOARD_ID, BOARD_CATEGORY_ID, USER_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_DATE, READ_COUNT, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CATEGORY_ID=#{boardCategoryId} ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC ) ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

select board.board_id as "boardId", board_category_id as "boardCategoryId", board_title as "boardTitle", board_content as "boardContent", board_date as "boardDate", user_id as "userId", read_count as "readCount", b_file_id as "bFileId", b_file_name as "bFileName", b_file_size as "bFileSize", b_file_content_type as "bFileContentType" from board left outer join board_file on board.board_id=board_file.board_id where board.board_id=#{boardId}

select b_file_id as "bFileId", b_file_name as "bFileName", b_file_size as "bFileSize", b_file_content_type as "bFileContentType", b_file_data as "bFileData", board_id as "boardId" from board_file where b_file_id=#{bFileId}

select comment_id as "commentId", comment_date as "commentDate", comment_content as "CommentContent", c.board_id as "boardId", c.user_id as "userId" from comments c left outer join board on c.board_id=board.board_id where c.board_id=#{boardId} order by comment_id desc OFFSET #{start}-1 ROWS FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY
INSERT INTO COMMENTS (COMMENT_ID, COMMENT_DATE, COMMENT_CONTENT, BOARD_ID, USER_ID) VALUES (seq_comment_id.nextval,sysdate,#{commentContent},#{boardId},#{userId})
